function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of discussion on socio-economic and institutional factors impacting resilience building potentials of smart solutions.","Impact":"Limited understanding of the real-world implications of smart solutions and technologies.","Mitigation":"Include a comprehensive exploration of socio-economic and institutional factors in future research.","Technologies":"Socio-economic analysis tools, institutional impact assessment tools.","People":"Researchers, policy makers, stakeholders.","Owner":"Research institutions, policy-making bodies."},{"Description":"Inadequate exploration of linkages between smart solutions and multiple resilience abilities.","Impact":"Missed opportunities to fully leverage the potential of smart solutions for enhancing resilience abilities.","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth research to better understand and document the linkages between smart solutions and resilience abilities.","Technologies":"Resilience assessment tools, smart solution impact analysis tools.","People":"Resilience researchers, technology experts, smart solution developers.","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies."},{"Description":"Limited examination of whether deployment of smart solutions may detract from resilience abilities.","Impact":"Risk of implementing smart solutions that inadvertently decrease resilience in certain contexts.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough impact assessments to identify potential negative impacts of smart solutions on resilience.","Technologies":"Resilience impact assessment tools, smart solution risk analysis tools.","People":"Resilience researchers, technology experts, community stakeholders.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, technology companies."}]}
